comment.author: 45989007@N06
comment._content: My Grandfather purchased an Elephants head he obtained in a clearance sale at Eaton Hall back in the summer of 1961. It was featured in the Staffordshire Evening Sentinel August 16 1961. My Grandfather mounted it on his living room wall at Park Hall Weston Coyney. Does anyone have a photo of it at Eaton Hall?
